task.summary: Geolocation service layer was created. Category and subcategory layers from repository to controller (GET method for all collection) were created.
Currency layers from repository to controller (GET method for all collection) were created.
Marker layers from repository to controller (GET method for all collection) were created.
HTTP API for advert adding is done.
Authorization refactoring and checking tags existing before advert adding.
